text: 210/390F, we recommend using a heat protectant always for heat styling) Will my ReXI‚Ñ¢ style tangle? ReXI‚Ñ¢ fibres are engineered to resist tangling and frizz, so your styles stay resistant to tangles with minimal upkeep. We recommend our Preserve Mist to preserve strand integrity , help with detangling, protection from frizz effect and matting. Can the hair be washed or reused? Absolutely. Our hair can be washed gently with mild shampoo and reused multiple times without losing its softness or sheen ( we recommend conditioning/moisturizing / hydrating shampoos) Is ReXI‚Ñ¢ hypoallergenic and safe for sensitive scalps? Yes. ReXI‚Ñ¢ fibres are lab-treated to be bacteria-resistant, skin-friendly, and developed hypoallergenic, making them suitable for sensitive skin and scalp. What‚Äôs the best way to maintain my style? Good storage, good combing/brushing techniques and great maintenance products. We offer individual styling tips for our styles and we recommend using our preserve mist & sheen drops product as maintenance product of choice Do your wigs come in different cap sizes?
